title: Having problems with lag? Try this
body:
Hello I know how annoying lag is and I have been lagging lately. I have good net and specs etc here is how I fixed it or at least got it to playable.

Settings: Custom
Resolution: Match desktop resolution
Character Quality: Very Low
Environment Quality: Very Low
Shadows: No Shadow
Effects Quality: Very Low
Frame Rate Cap: 60 FPS
Wait for Vertical Sync: Unchecked
Anti-Aliasing: Unchecked

For the character and environment quality you can have low instead of very low, just try different things. 

This is what work for me especially these two things:
Wait for Vertical Sync: Unchecked
Anti-Aliasing: Unchecked

Hope this heaps!

-Jaffa

replies.body: show specs to prove....because none of those things will matter with lag...unless its your specs no up to scratch.
Don't get mad at me, be mad at riot as this happens every time to many after patches. I was simply proving one solution as this is what helped me.

you werent proving anything. you made a suggestion saying that is what you do to fix lag on your system...BUT that means its system side problems. because nothing changed there will effect the ping in ANY way. it will help reduce system lag tho. and even then, its a stretch.
